rule.name: eea-asyncmove-rule-fail
rule.title: Async move failed
rule.description: Notify the person who requested to move folder that move failed.

rule.name: eea-asyncmove-rule-success
rule.title: Async move succeeded
rule.description: Notify the person who requested to move a folder that move is successfull.

action.property:
Your request to move ${folder_move_objects} from ${folder_move_from} to ${folder_move_to} is ready.
---------- This email is auto-generated and delivered to you because a move operation was requested for ${folder_move_from}. If you did not request this then just ignore this email. ----------
Your content has been moved successfully

rule.name: eea-asyncmove-rule-added
rule.title: Async operation added
rule.description: Notify the person who requested the async operation that it was added to the queue.

action.property:
Dear user, you have requested to do a ${asyncmove_operation} for ${asyncmove_objects}. We have added your request to the async queue, there are ${asyncmove_queue_length} jobs in the queue before your job is executed. You will receive an email when the job is done.
---------- This email is auto-generated and delivered to you because a ${asyncmove_operation} operation was requested for ${folder_move_from}. If you did not request this then just ignore this email. ----------
Your operation has been added to the queue successfully

rule.name: eea-asyncmove-rename-rule-fail
rule.title: Async rename failed
rule.description: Notify the person who requested to rename object that action failed.

rule.name: eea-asyncmove-rename-rule-success
rule.title: Async rename succeeded
rule.description: Notify the person who requested to rename an object that action is successfull.

action.property:
Your request to rename ${folder_move_objects} is ready.
---------- This email is auto-generated and delivered to you because a rename operation was requested for ${folder_move_from}. If you did not request this then just ignore this email. ----------
Your content has been renamed successfully
